channel.title: Comments on: Get Corona Geek on iTunes, Stitcher, and Chrome

item.title: By: charlesmckeever
item.dc:creator: charlesmckeever
item.description: Thanks to everyone how has already installed the Chrome Extension. Let me know if you have suggestions or feedback how you use it. Thanks to Dean Murphy from http://EchoEcho.es/ and Jordan Schuetz from http://ninjapigstudios.com/ who left their review in the Chrome Store already. You both rock!
item.content:encoded: Thanks to everyone how has already installed the Chrome Extension. Let me know if you have suggestions or feedback how you use it. Thanks to Dean Murphy from http://EchoEcho.es/ and Jordan Schuetz from http://ninjapigstudios.com/ who left their review in the Chrome Store already. You both rock!
